00049 /*-- Globals -------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 
00051 /* The frontend name (client name) as seen by other MIDAS clients   */
00052 char *frontend_name = "BL Frontend";
00053 /* The frontend file name, don't change it */
00054 char *frontend_file_name = __FILE__;
00055 
00056 /* frontend_loop is called periodically if this variable is TRUE    */
00057 BOOL frontend_call_loop = TRUE;
00058 
00059 /* a frontend status page is displayed with this frequency in ms    */
00060 INT display_period = 1000;
00061 
00062 /* maximum event size produced by this frontend */
00063 INT max_event_size = 10000;
00064 
00065 /* buffer size to hold events */
00066 INT event_buffer_size = 10 * 10000;
00067 
00068 /*-- Equipment list ------------------------------------------------*/
00069 
00070 /* 
00071 The following statement allocates 10 channels for the beamline
00072 control through the epics channel access device driver. The 
00073 EPICS channel names are stored under 
00074    
00075   /Equipment/Beamline/Settings/Devices/Beamline
00076 
00077 while the channel names as the midas slow control sees them are
00078 under 
00079 
00080   /Equipment/Bemaline/Settings/Names
00081 
00082 An example set of channel names is saved in the triumf.odb file
00083 in this directory and can be loaded into the ODB with the odbedit
00084 command
00085 
00086   load triumf.odb
00087 
00088 before the frontend is started. The CMD_SET_LABEL statement 
00089 actually defines who determines the label name. If this flag is
00090 set, the CMD_SET_LABEL command in the device driver is disabled,
00091 therefore the label is taken from EPICS, otherwise the label is
00092 taken from MIDAS and set in EPICS.
00093 
00094 The same can be done with the demand values. If the command
00095 CMD_SET_DEMAND is disabled, the demand value is always determied
00096 by EPICS.
00097 */
00098 
00099 /* device driver list */
00100 DEVICE_DRIVER epics_driver[] = {
00101    {"Beamline", epics_ca, 10, NULL, 0, CMD_SET_LABEL},  /* disable CMD_SET_LABEL */
00102    {""}
00103 };
00104 
00105 EQUIPMENT equipment[] = {
00106 
00107    {"Beamline",                 /* equipment name */
00108     3, 0,                       /* event ID, trigger mask */
00109     "SYSTEM",                   /* event buffer */
00110     EQ_SLOW,                    /* equipment type */
00111     0,                          /* event source */
00112     "FIXED",                    /* format */
00113     TRUE,                       /* enabled */
00114     RO_RUNNING | RO_TRANSITIONS,        /* read when running and on transitions */
00115     60000,                      /* read every 60 sec */
00116     0,                          /* stop run after this event limit */
00117     0,                          /* number of sub events */
00118     1,                          /* log history every event */
00119     "", "", "",
00120     cd_gen_read,                /* readout routine */
00121     cd_gen,                     /* class driver main routine */
00122     epics_driver,               /* device driver list */
00123     NULL,                       /* init string */
00124     },
00125 
00126    {""}
00127 };
00128

00144    /* anable/disable certain command in device driver */
00145 
00146 
00147    return CM_SUCCESS;

00156 
00157 /*-- Frontend Loop -------------------------------------------------*/
00158 
00159 INT frontend_loop()
00160 {
00161    /* slow down frontend not to eat all CPU cycles */
00162    ss_sleep(200);
00163 
00164    return CM_SUCCESS;
00165 }
00166
